summary:
I have completed tasks 1 and 2 of the company-seo-pages session. Here's a summary of what was accomplished:

## Completed Tasks

### Task 1: Create CompanyList Livewire component
- Created `/laravel/app/Livewire/CompanyList.php` with:
  - Company metrics calculation (avg price, emissions, renewable %, contract count)
  - Ranking categories: cheapest, greenest, cleanest emissions, most contracts, best spot margins, lowest monthly fees, 100% renewable
  - JSON-LD ItemList schema for SEO
  - Search functionality for filtering companies

### Task 2: Create CompanyList Blade view
- Created `/laravel/resources/views/livewire/company-list.blade.php` with:
  - Hero section titled "Sähköyhtiöt Suomessa"
  - Category ranking sections (top 5 per category as cards)
  - 100% renewable companies section
  - Full company grid with search filter
  - Links to individual company pages at `/sahkosopimus/sahkoyhtiot/{slug}`
  - JSON-LD structured data

### Also Partially Completed (Route Setup)
